alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:51PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 430 PM MST... At 351 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Boyce Thompson Arboretum, or 9 miles south of Superior, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Superior and Boyce Thompson Arboretum. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 217 and 231. AZ Route 177 between mile markers 159 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
